torch.description:
## Overview
[torch](https://pypi.org/project/torch) is a Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU acceleration
Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Command Injection in `torch.jit.annotations.parse_type_line` which can cause arbitrary code execution because `eval` is used unsafely.
## Remediation
Upgrade `torch` to version 1.13.1 or higher.
## References
- [GitHub Commit](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/commit/74a9ca993bd79f8131829e9c946657fa9a1d05ef)
- [GitHub Commit](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/commit/767f6aa49fe20a2766b9843d01e3b7f7793df6a3)
- [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/88868)
torch.name: SNYK-PYTHON-TORCH-3149871
torch.title: IN1-PYTHON-TORCH-3149871 - torch
torch.reason_to_ignore: The binaries are patched for this CVE, but the system checks version and not code.
